Diary of Lydia:
The thirtieth day of the month of Shilen.

Tomorrow is an important day! I must talk with the Father. The word Nidrah'a now has too much value!
Royal guide Run'y missed for ages, and something had to happen! Brother Eilhalder said our family should first stand on a sewn Run'y, not the royal family!
I'm not sure and I do not believe in all this...
Nidrah came to me this evening. He told me that no matter what I decided, I must always show their courage during the terrible time. What did he mean by that? I was always brave!
Turn the page.
